description.fr:
<rem>{PropertyEffect:28}</rem>
\---
{%attack} Subit {value:hpLoss,percent} de sa {%pvmax,plural:other} et gagne {value:arGain,percent} de son {%AT} en {%ar,plural:other}.
description.en:
<rem>{PropertyEffect:28}</rem>
\---
{%attack} Endures {value:hpLoss,percent} {%pvmax,plural:other} and gains {value:arGain,percent} of their {%AT} as {%ar,plural:other}.
description.es:
<rem>{PropertyEffect:28}</rem>
\---
{%attack} Pierde un {value:hpLoss,percent} de sus {%pvmax,plural:other} y gana un {value:arGain,percent} de su {%AT} en {%ar,plural:other}.
description.de:
<rem>{PropertyEffect:28}</rem>
\---
{%attack} Verliert {value:hpLoss,percent} seiner {%pvmax,plural:other} und erhält {value:arGain,percent} seines {%AT}s als {%ar,plural:other}.
description.pt:
<rem>{PropertyEffect:28}</rem>
\---
{%attack} Sofre {value:hpLoss,percent} de seus {%pvmax,plural:other} e ganha {value:arGain,percent} de seu {%AT} em {%ar,plural:other}.

gameplayDescription.fr: {PropertyEffect:28}\_: Plus vous avez mal, plus vous faites de dégâts\_! \--- ATTAQUE\_: Le meilleur moyen de gagner, c'est de cogner\_! \--- {%AT}\_: Votre force brute\_! Plus vous l'améliorerez, plus vous taperez fort... \--- {%AR}\_: ... et plus vous aurez d'Armure\_! L'Armure permet d'encaisser les dégâts reçus\_!
gameplayDescription.en: {PropertyEffect:28}: The more you hurt, the more damage you do! \--- ATTACK: The best way to win is to hit hard! \--- {%AT}: Your raw strength! The more you improve it, the harder you'll hit… \--- {%AR}: …and the more Armor you'll have! Armor lets you withstand damage!
gameplayDescription.es: {PropertyEffect:28}: Cuanto peor estás, más daño haces. \--- ATAQUE: ¡La mejor forma de ganar es golpear! \--- {%AT}: ¡Tu fuerza bruta! Cuanto más lo mejores, más fuerte golpearás… \--- {%AR}: … y más armadura tendrás. La armadura permite soportar mejor los daños recibidos.
gameplayDescription.de: {PropertyEffect:28}: Je mehr Schmerzen du hast, desto mehr Schaden richtest du an! \--- ANGRIFF: Zuschlagen ist das beste Mittel, um zu gewinnen! \--- {%AT}: Deine rohe Kraft! Je mehr du sie verbesserst, desto stärker schlägst du zu\_… \--- {%AR}: … und umso mehr Rüstung wirst du haben! Dank der Rüstung kannst du erlittenen Schaden wegstecken!
gameplayDescription.pt: {PropertyEffect:28}: Quanto mais você se machuca, mais dano você causa! \--- ATAQUE: O melhor jeito de vencer é atacando! \--- {%AT}: Sua força bruta! Quanto mais você aprimorar, mais fortes serão os seus golpes... \--- {%AR}: ... e mais Armadura você terá! A Armadura permite resistir mais aos danos sofridos!
